text: Eva Green (born July 6, 1980) is a French actress and model. She acts in movies and in television series. She played Vesper Lynd in the 2006 James Bond movie Casino Royale. Green was born in Paris. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Paris Category:Actresses who played Bond girls Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors
title: Eva Green
